reviewText:
Plith is a game that I recommend because:
- is a method to banish boredom
- it has an acceptable price
- it is a good puzzle game
- it is indie & casual
- it has trading cards

Enjoy!

reviewText:
Product received for free

Terrible game! It loads slowly, it is ugly and even the terrible graphics sometimes can not handle the game.
It also crashes, making it impossible to get 100% achievements, because you have to complete the game without ever closing it.
